hero.title: Trouvez votre place au Québec
hero.subtitle: Liggéey, làkk wu faransee, dugg ci réew mi ak njëlbéen: ndimbal bu dul fey, dalal ba pare.

slide1.quote: Kii nit ku dugg ci sunu bunt moo wara am njàkkaari wërsëg
slide1.author: Nadia R.

slide2.quote: Gis sama taalibe yi di wax faransee ak ngëm, moo tax ma bég lool
slide2.author: Marco T.

slide3.quote: Du liggéey rekk lañuy gis, ndax dañuy tabax lëndëm fii
slide3.author: Sylvie D.

slide4.quote: Ndimbal mbokk yi, moo di sëmm bépp askan
slide4.author: Fatima H.

slide5.quote: Ndimbal ngir xam sisteem Quebec bi soppi lépp
slide5.author: David C.

needs.title: Lan ngay soxla?
needs.subtitle: Danuy la ànd ci bépp etaap bu sa dugg ci Québec
needs.instruction: Tànnal njoxe benn ngir xam lu ci gën a yàgg

cards.volunteering: Bëgg naa bokk ci liggéeyu mbooleem

newsSection.title: Xam-xam
newsSection.subtitle: Gindikaayu njëlbéen, seede yi ak xibaar yi ngir mën sa dugg

news.calloutText: Sunu jëfandikukat yi ci jàpp lañu ngir la ànd ci say jëf.

1.title: Sa 10 jëf yu njëkk yi bu ngay ñëw Québec
1.excerpt: Jël sa NAS ba binda ci RAMQ, fii mooy listu lépp ngir tambalee sa dundu bu bees.

4.title: Naka lañuy feesal sa dipoloom ci Québec
4.excerpt: Nataalug dipoloom, jàmm yu liggéey, mbooleem... Yoon wi etaap-etaap ngir yokk njariñu say jàng.

7.title: Dëgëral sa nëgu tuuti bu njëkk ci Québec
7.excerpt: Yéere, jëmm, tangaay, liggéeyu mbooleem: lépp luy wara xam ngir bëgg nëgu tuuti bi ci Montréal.

10.title: Dégg jàmmu wér gi ci Québec
10.excerpt: RAMQ, doktoor bu kër, urjaans, farmaasi: gindikaay bu mat ngir ñiy ñëw fii.

13.title: 5 aplikasion yu dul fey ngir jàng faransee
13.excerpt: Yokkal say jàng ak yii aplikasionu telefon bi ñu waxe nañu ci sunu kilifa yu francisation.

14.title: Wut néeg ci Montréal: gindikaay bu njëlbéen
14.excerpt: Bay, sañ-sañu ñiy fey néeg, fan lañuy wut, yéenal yi: lépp ngir gis sa néeg ci Montréal.

15.title: Wut liggéey ci Québec: lu kenn waxul la
15.excerpt: CV bu Québec, entërviu, xam-xam nit, marché caché: kodu marché du travail bii fii.

16.title: Saytu say xaalis te dégg alkaati ci Québec
16.excerpt: Taksi, crédit, bujet, ndimbal yu mbokk yi: njëkk yi ngir saytu say xaalis bu baax.

media.videoNotSupported: Sa navigatër mënul a jàll wideo.
media.audioNotSupported: Sa navigatër mënul a jàll odio.

activitiesSection.title: Sunu liggéeyu ci àttë
activitiesSection.subtitle: Duggal ci sunu askan te bokkal ci sunu ateliye, jàng ak liggéeyu mbooleem

testimonialsSection.title: Ñoo mënal ak CARI
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Xoolal taariixu ñi gënal te gis seen place ci Québec

items.name: Asma B.
items.text: Ci kàttanu CARI, gis naa sama liggéeyu xel ci 6 weer! Ndimbal bu personal bi ak ateliye yi jox nañu ma ngëm ngir mën samu entërviu yi.

items.name: Jean-Pierre H.
items.text: Réfugié laa woon, tey entrepreneur laa. CARI ànd na ma ci bépp etaap. Tey am naa sama entreprise te 5 nit lañu ci liggéey.

items.name: Jasmine M.
items.text: Faransee dafa woon mel ni mënuloo ko, tey maa koy wax bu baax! Jàng yi dañu baax te kilifa yi dañu muñ.

items.name: Karla A.
items.text: Sama doom yi neex nañu, gis nanu sunu bopp fii. Njoxe yu mbokk yi ci CARI moo tax lépp soppi.

items.name: Wei L.
items.text: Ndimbal bi ngir dégg jàmmu Québec moo soppi lépp. Tey damay gis ni kër laa nekk ci Montréal.

parallaxItems.quote: Jàkkaari, déglu, oriante — mooy sunu mission bépp bés.
parallaxItems.name: Nadia R.

parallaxItems.quote: Bépp CV boo sàmee, mooy bunt bu ubbiku.
parallaxItems.name: Marco T.

parallaxItems.quote: Jàngal faransee, mooy jox kiliye yu dundu bu bees.
parallaxItems.name: Sylvie D.

services.title: Sunu njoxe yi
services.subtitle: Solusjoon yi mu sellal sa mbir

welcome.title: Njàkkaari ak Dugg
welcome.description: Xibaar, oriante ak ndimbal bu personal ngir wëral sa tabax.
welcome.fullDescription: Sunu njoxe bu njàkkaari ak dugg moo di ànd ak ñiy dikk ci kàttanu jëfandikukat yu profesijonel yu di jox ndimbal bu mat ngir dugg ci aduna ak liggéey.
benefits: Ndajte yu xibaar ak oriante yu kenn-kenn
Yónni ci ressource yu askan wi
Ndimbal ngir mën otonom ak indepandaas
welcome.details: Njoxe bu dul fey bu ñu wax ci faransee, anglais, español, araab ak yeneen làkk. Jottali ci bureau walla ci telefon.

items.name: Ndimbal ci tabax ak dugg
items.description: Ànd ngir kaart RAMQ, NAS, binda ci garderi, binda ci ekol ak jëfu tabax.

items.name: Ndimbal ci formiler administratif yi
items.description: Alokasion familiyal, laaykat, formiler yu situwayënte, yeesal pérmi liggéey.

items.name: Wut néeg
items.description: Ànd ci wutu néeg ak dégg sañ-sañu ñiy fey néeg/boromu kër.

items.name: Seerment
items.description: Déklarasion solanël, bataaxe yu tàggat, otorizasion bi voyaaj, prokurasiyon ak kopi yi ñu sertifiye. 15 kopi yu njëkk yi dul fey ngir immigrant ci Canada ci lu wàññi ci 5 at.

items.name: Klinik juridik
items.description: Xibaar juridik bu dul fey ci néeg, imigrasion, sañ-sañu mbokk ci kàttanu sunu partenër Pro Bono ak Droit Légal.

items.name: Déklarasion alkaati
items.description: Ndimbal ci at bu nekk ci déklarasion alkaati ci sunu klinik dimpóo.

items.name: Xibaar ak yónni
items.description: Nataalug soxla yi bu profesijonel te yónni ci ressource yu askan wu baax.

items.name: Médiasion interculturel ak interprétasion
items.description: Ndimbal ngir dégg bataaxe yu guwernëmaan ak naawigasion ci sistèm sosjal yi.

items.name: Topp bu personal ak ndimbal psikososjal
items.description: Ànd bu suturlu ak ndimbal bu xol ci yoonu dugg bi yépp.

items.name: Ndajte yu xibaar
items.description: Ateliye ci sañ-sañu ñiy fey néeg, saytu xaalis, sistèm ekoler ci Québec, alkaati ak dëgëral nëgu tuuti.

items.name: Komite Barab Góor
items.description: Ndimbal psikososjal bu specialise, ànd bu personal ak yónni ci ressource ngir góor yi ñiy dikk.

items.name: Kàmp bakkan yu mbokk
items.description: Toog ci salet ci biir gëj ci wettu Montréal ngir mbokk yi, ci kadrë interculturel.

items.name: Gejj yu mbokk
items.description: Liggéeyu kiltir ak seetlu: Québec, chutu Montmorency, Zoo de Granby, Jardin botanique, Biodôme, raxas poom, kër sirop.

french.title: Jàng Faransee
french.description: Jàng faransee bu mu sellal immigrant yi, tolof-tolof yépp, waxtu yu suux (8h30-22h). Nataalal sa tolof-tolof bu dul fey!
french.fullDescription: Faransee mooy làkk wu oficijel te wu askan wi ci Québec. CARI dafay jox jàng faransee yu dul fey yu guwernëmaan finanse, ci waxtu bu mat ak bu yaatu, ci tolof-tolof bu njëkk ba ci bu yàgg.
benefits: Jàng ci waxtu bu mat ak bu yaatu
Kilifa yu am xam-xam te am jubbanti
Metod yu mu sellal immigrant yi
Nataalug tolof-tolof bu dul fey ci 10 simili
french.details: Jàng yu dul fey yu MIFI finanse. Am nañu alokasion bokk. Binda ci lu bés.

sections.title: Jàng ci waxtu bu mat
sections.description: Programa intensif bu 25 waxtu ci ayu-bis ngir nit ñu yatuwaagu jàng. 20 waxtu ci klaas ak kilifa ak 5 waxtu ak animatër. Sesion yu 11 ayu-bis, 4 sesion ci at.

sections.title: Jàng ci waxtu bu yaatu
sections.description: Programa ngir nit yi ñiy dikk yu am alif (minimum 9 at ci jàng). Programa d'intégration linguistique des immigrants (PILI) moo ko jox.

items.name: Suba: 9h00-12h00
items.description: 9 ba 12 waxtu ci ayu-bis

items.name: Ngoon: 12h30-15h30
items.description: 9 ba 12 waxtu ci ayu-bis

items.name: Guddi: 18h30-21h30
items.description: 6 ba 9 waxtu ci ayu-bis

items.name: Gejju dëkk bi
items.description: Seetlu ci bibliotek, muze, sàntaru liggéeyu askan, bitik ak fripëri.

items.name: Rali ak seetlu
items.description: Seetlu Vieux-Port ak rañ ci dëkk bi.

sections.title: Garderi
sections.description: Njoxe bu garderi am na ngir doom yi 0 ba 5 at, MIFI moo fey lépp.

employment.title: Ndimbal ci Liggéey
employment.description: Ateliye CV, simile entërviu, coaching profesijonel ak ndajte ak buur liggéey yi.
employment.fullDescription: Am liggéey moo di kondision bu wara am ngir dugg bu baax! Sunu départëmaan moo di ànd ak dugg immigrant yi ci marché liggéey ci kàttanu ndimbal bu personal ak liggéeyu mbooleem.
benefits: Ateliye binda CV ak bataaxe motivasion
Ndajte jub ak buur liggéey yi
Ànd ci wutu liggéey bu aktif
employment.details: Njoxe bu dul fey ak topp bu personal. Jottali bu kenn-kenn ak ateliye yu mbooleem yu siiw.

items.name: Tàbbi ci liggéey
items.description: Bokkaale ak entreprise yu Québec ngir tàbbi ci liggéey ak stage.

items.name: Rezo xam-xam nit
items.description: Xam-xam nit profesijonel ak ndajte ak buur liggéey yi.

items.name: Def CV
items.description: Ndimbal ci binda CV bu mu sellal marché Québec.

items.name: Ateliye wut liggéey
items.description: 8 ateliye ci at, sesion yu 5 ayu-bis (9h-16h), ci 15 bokkaalekat. Metod ak jumtukaay yu wut liggéey.

items.name: Mën-mën yu benn
items.description: Nataalug mën-mën, stratéji wut, jokkoo, xam-xam nit, jubbanti ci barabu liggéey ci Québec.

items.name: Ndimbal bu personal
items.description: Ànd bu kenn-kenn: CV, bataaxe motivasion, dëgëral entërviu, oriante ci marché liggéey, yónni buur liggéey.

items.name: Dëgëral entërviu
items.description: Simile entërviu ak coaching bu personal.

items.name: Bind post
items.description: Jël ci ab basen bu am nit yu dikk yu am kàlifikasion.

items.name: Tànn wutukat yi
items.description: Tànn ci sunu basenu talaa ci ay sektër yu bari.

items.name: Profil yu am
items.description: Administrasion, kontabilite, informatik, enjeniëri, telekominikasion, lekk, juridik, àddina.

items.name: Topp ci dund ci liggéey
items.description: Ndimbal ngir buur liggéey yi ngir dugg diversite ci barabu liggéey.

items.name: Ndimbal xaalis
items.description: Ànd ngir jël programa guwernëmaan yi ci sibvansion alér.

items.name: Ndajte ak buur liggéey
items.description: Liggéeyu weer bu nekk ngir xam-xam nit diggante buur liggéey ak ñiy wut liggéey.

items.name: Rendez-vous Laurentien de l'Emploi
items.description: Liggéeyu at bu nekk bu di lëkkalante buur liggéey ak lu gën ci 100 ñiy wut liggéey.

family.title: Waajur-Ndaw yi
family.description: Ndimbal ngir mbokk yi, liggéeyu mbooleem ngir doom yi ak mag-ndaw yi, ndimbal ci jàng.
family.fullDescription: Sunu départëmaan moo di ndimbal mbokk yi ñiy dikk ngir dégg sistèm ekoler ci Québec, jox ndimbal psikologik, njoxe bu garderi te bokk ci yokk doom yi ak seen jàng.
benefits: Njoxe bu garderi ngir ndaw yi tuuti
family.details: Njoxe yu dul fey walla yu wàññi. Plas yu dëgër, bindal wara na am.

items.name: Ànd ci sistèm ekoler
items.description: Ndimbal ak oriante ngir mbokk yi ñiy dikk ci sistèm ekoler ci Québec, wëral jokkoo diggante ekol ak mbokk.

items.name: Klinik Ndaw-Mbokk
items.description: Njoxe bu dul fey te suturlu bu mbokk yi mën a wax ci jafe-jafe yu doom yi ak personal bu specialise, ci kadrë bu dëgër te profesijonel.

items.name: Ateliye Barabu Waajur
items.description: 9 ateliye yu di ndimbal waajur yi ngir dégg seen rolu ci jàng doom seeni ak naawige sistèm ekoler.

items.name: Mbooloom ndimbal ngir waajur yi
items.description: Yokk mën-mën waajur ak programa « Y'a personne de parfait »: jëm, yokk, kàttanu ak rolu waajur.

items.name: Maay mag ci garderi askan
items.description: Programa edikasion bu jox liggéeyu yaram, cuuj ak jàng ngir doom yi.

items.name: Kàmp été yu wàññi njëg
items.description: Kàmp été ngir doom yi ekol primër yu mbokk yi ñiy dikk yu am xaalis yu wàññi, ak pratik faransee.

items.name: Kàmp relax
items.description: Programa kàmp ci ayu-bisu relax bi ci jàng.

items.name: Andi wér
items.description: Programa weer bu nekk ci andi yu mardi ngir jàng dolli lekk yu wér ci cuisine collective, ci bokkaale ak Jigéen yu àdduna.

sections.title: Garderi
sections.description: Njoxe bu garderi am na ngir waajur yi bokk ci liggéeyu mbooleem, dolli ñiy laaj azil. Wootal ngir xam mbir mi.

women.title: Jigéen yu àdduna
women.description: Programa yu baaxal jigéen yi ñiy dikk: otonom, wér gi, liggéey.
women.fullDescription: Ci wet wax ak liggéeyu mbooleem yu bare, dañuy jox jigéen yi barab ngir gën a xam réew mu ñu jaamu ak seen bopp. Yokk mën-mën, xam-xam nit, benevolaa ak bokkaale askan.
women.details: Bu dul fey te suturlu. Mbooloom bu gëm te wërsëg. Garderi am na ci laaykat.

items.name: Njaay ak tëgg loxo
items.description: Ateliye def ci kadrë bu gëm: njaay masiin, gatu mbubb, yeesal ak sàmm yéere.

items.name: Wér ak cuisine internasional
items.description: Jàng dolli lekk yu wér ak prodiwi Québec ak seetlu andi tradisionel yu réew yu bare.

items.name: Pratik faransee
items.description: Yokk dégg ci nopp ak jokkoo ci kàttanu apliker jàng faransee yi.

items.name: Wax ak portëfolio profesijonel
items.description: Yokk otonomu profesijonel, jël desision, tàkkal objectif ak teknik otopromosion.

items.name: Bokkaale ci askan
items.description: Ateliye ci réew Québec, kondision jigéen yi, yegesi sañ-sañ ak liggéeyu sosjal.

items.name: Kafe-waxtan
items.description: Ndajte yu suuf ngir jigéen yi ñiy dikk di séddalante seen jubbanti ci réew Québec.

items.name: Yoga
items.description: Sesion dolli yaram ak saytu stress.

items.name: Gejj yu mbokk
items.description: Gejj yu organise ci bokkaale ak njoxe bu njàkkaari ak dugg.

items.name: Bibliotek yu dund
items.description: Seede yu bopp ci diversite, rasisim, sañ-sañu nit ak yemale jigéen-góor ngir xeex stereotip.

items.name: Klëbu jàng ak taariixu dund
items.description: Waxtan jàng ak projeey binda yu mbooleem yu di jël taariix yu bopp.

items.name: Mu di njaay Ekolo
items.description: Ateliye edikasion ci njariñu industri mbubb ak alternatif eko-kreatif.

items.name: Barab ngir jigéen
items.description: Ateliye yegesi ci njariñu sosjo-ekolojik industri mbubb ak alternatif yu dund.

items.name: Ndimbal psikososjal
items.description: Ànd bu personal te suturlu ngir tontu soxla ak jafe-jafe yu jigéen yi ñiy dikk.

contactInfo.note: Alt-Àjj 8h30-17h00 · Bu dul fey te suturlu

men.title: Barab Góor
men.description: Ndimbal psikososjal bu specialise, ànd bu personal ak yónni ci ressource ngir góor yi ñiy dikk.
men.fullDescription: Komite Barab Góor bu CARI St-Laurent mooy benn ci programa yi ne amul ci Québec yu jox njoxe yu baaxal góor yi ñiy dikk. Ci kàttanu ateliye wax, ndimbal psikososjal ak ànd bu personal, dañuy ndimbal góor yi ngir mën jafe-jafe yu dugg.
benefits: Ndimbal psikososjal bu kenn-kenn te suturlu
Ànd bu personal ci jëf yi
Rezo ndimbal diggante góor yi ñiy dikk
Liggéeyu mbooleem ak waxtan yu tema
men.details: Bu dul fey te suturlu. Barab bu dëgër te wërsëg bu ñu def ngir góor yi ñiy dikk.

items.name: Ateliye wax
items.description: Barab yéene ak séddale ngir wax ci jafe-jafe dugg, nit-ku-góor, waajur ak xarit interculturel.

items.name: Waxtan yu tema
items.description: Waxtan ci marché liggéey, sañ-sañ ak wàllu, wéru xel ak dëgg imigrasion ci Québec.

items.name: Liggéeyu sport ak sosjal
items.description: Ndajte yu suuf ak liggéeyu yaram ngir xam-xam nit ak neex.

items.name: Ndimbal psikososjal
items.description: Ànd bu kenn-kenn te suturlu ngir tontu soxla yu baaxal góor yi ñiy dikk: kenn-kenn, wahm, dund.

items.name: Yónni ak oriante
items.description: Oriante ci ressource yu askan ak yu guwernëmaan yu mu sellal soxla yi.

contactInfo.note: Alt-Àjj 8h30-17h00 · Bu dul fey te suturlu

taxes.title: Klinik dimpóo
taxes.description: Ndimbal bu dul fey ci déklarasion alkaati ngir nit yi ñiy dikk ak mbokk yi am xaalis yu wàññi.
taxes.fullDescription: Ci at bu nekk, CARI St-Laurent dafay jox njoxe bu dul fey ngir dëgëral déklarasion alkaati ci kàttanu bénévol yu formasion am. Njoxe bii mooy ngir nit yi ñiy dikk ak mbokk yi am xaalis yu wàññi ñu soxla ndimbal ngir def seen déklarasion fédéral ak provënsial.
benefits: Kenn du sa laaj jottali ci waxtu dimpóo
taxes.details: Njoxe bu seesoniye ci mars ba avril. Indil say T4, reelve, resu ak kaart identite.

items.name: Dëgëral déklarasion
items.description: Ndimbal bu mat ngir féexal say déklarasion alkaati fédéral ak provënsial, dolli formiler yi wara am.

items.name: Krédi ak prestasion
items.description: Xool ndax am nga Alokasion kanadiyen ngir doom yi (ACE), krédi TPS/TVH, krédi solidarite Québec ak yeneen prestasion.

items.name: Déklarasion bu njëkk
items.description: Ànd bu specialise ngir ñi neeweeku di def seen déklarasion alkaati bu njëkk ci Canada.

items.name: Fëyee fiskal
items.description: T4 (liggéey), T4A (prestasion), T5 (alkaatu plasmaan), Relevé 1, ak bépp fëyee fiskal bu la indi.

items.name: Kaart identite
items.description: Kaart résident permanent, pérmi liggéey walla bépp kaart identite bu baax ak nimero asirans sosjal.

contactInfo.note: Mars ba avril · Alt-Àjj 9h-16h · Bu dul fey

volunteering.title: Formasion ak dund ci askan
volunteering.description: Ndajte interculturel, liggéeyu sosjal ak wayu benevolaa.
volunteering.fullDescription: Indil ñi neeweeku ngir yokk fibar askan te bokk ci réew mu ñu jaamu ci kàttanu formasion ak liggéeyu mbooleem. Yokk otonom, mën-mën ak xam-xam nit.
volunteering.details: Bu dul fey. Bokk bu suux mu dal ci say waxtu. Sertifika benevolaa am na.

items.name: Jàng anglais
items.description: Tolof-tolof intermedyeer ak avanse ngir résident permanent ak situwayeen kanadiyen yu wax faransee. Gëramer, binda, jàng, dégg ak waxtan.

items.name: Jàng informatik
items.description: Sesion yu 6 ayu-bis: Word, Excel, PowerPoint ci tolof-tolof bu njëkk, intermedyeer ak avanse.

items.name: Waxtan anglais
items.description: Ateliye jokkoo ak wax ngir tolof-tolof yépp.

items.name: Jokkoo ak bokk
items.description: 6 ateliye jokkoo ndaw, wax ci kanam nit ak bokk ci askan ngir ñu wax faransee.

items.name: Dëgëral eksame situwayënte
items.description: Jumtukaay ak ressource ngir dëgëral eksame situwayënte kanadiyen.

items.name: ABC sumu dugg
items.description: 4 ateliye ci dugg bes-bu-bés, aktif, akademik ak sosjal.

items.name: Bési branché yi
items.description: Ateliye ci jumtukaay teknolojikal ak web ngir dund bes-bu-bés.

items.name: Siberguwernëmaan
items.description: Ubbiku ci njoxe guwernëmaan ci internet ak prestasion yi am.

items.name: Barab Rezo
items.description: Ateliye yokk rezo ak mën-mën ci medya sosjal (Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram).

items.name: Àllarba yi EPVC
items.description: Ateliye ñaari ayu-bis ak ñaari yoon: Eko-situwayeen (àddina, zéro déchets, tool) ak Québec xam naa ko (taariix, cuisine, làkk, kiltir).

items.name: Bokkaale ci askan
items.description: Konsiltasion askan, barab bokk civik ngir 18-35 at, ndajte xibaar ci benevolaa.

items.name: Liggéeyu sosjo-kiltir
items.description: Gejj ci muze ak teeaatr, waxtan ci film, màngo interculturel, projeey kreatif dolli teeaatr ak maratoŋ binda.

items.name: Dugg ci biir àddina
items.description: Liggéeyu biir àddina ak sport lokal ngir wëral dugg.

items.name: Bokkaale làkk
items.description: Programa séddalante làkk ngir pratike faransee ak bénévol yi.

items.name: Bokkaale interculturel
items.description: Pont sosjal ak lingistik diggante ñi neeweeku ak Québécois yi.

items.name: Bokkaale artistik
items.description: Bokkaale artistik diggante artis Québécois ak immigrant yi ngir ekspozision mbooleem.

sections.title: Benevolaa
sections.description: Bokkal sa bopp! Wayu benevolaa: liggéey administratif, njàkkaari liggéeyu mbooleem, ko-animasion ateliye, interprétasion, ndimbal ci garderi ak organise sesion.

form.name: Tur bu mat

responses.greeting: Salamaaleykum! Bég naa la ndimbal. CARI am na 6 njoxe yu am solo ngir sa dugg ci Québec. Kan mooy njoxe bi la gën a neex?
responses.services:
Sunu 6 njoxe:
• Njàkkaari ak Dugg
• Jàng Faransee (8h30-22h)
• Ndimbal ci Liggéey (85% mënal!)
• Njoxe yu mbokk
• Jigéen yu àdduna
• Benevolaa ak Bokkaale

Ci kan ngay bëgg xibaar yu gën?
responses.appointment:
Ngir jël jottali:
• Wootaal (514) 748-2007
• Féexal formiler bi ci bii xët
• Am na Alt-Àjj 9h-16h30

Ban konsiltasion? (njàkkaari/faransee/liggéey)
responses.contact:
(514) 748-2007
carist@cari.qc.ca
774 boul. Décarie #300, Saint-Laurent
Alt-Àjj: 9h-12h, 12h30-16h30

Naka lay mën a gën a ndimbal?
responses.french:
Sunu jàng faransee:
• 8h30-22h (suux lool!)
• Tolof-tolof yépp nañu ko nangu
• Metod yu mu sellal immigrant yi
• Nataalug tolof-tolof bu dul fey

Bëgg nga planifiye ab evaluasion?
responses.employment:
Sunu ndimbal ci liggéey:
• Ateliye CV/bataaxe motivasion
• Simile entërviu
• Coaching profesijonel
• Ndajte ak buur liggéey
• 85% dañuy gis liggéey ci 6 weer!

Bëgg nga konsiltasion liggéey?
responses.default:
Mën naa la ndimbal ak:
• Xibaar ci sunu njoxe yi
• Jël jottali
• Jokkoo
• Digël yu personal

Lan ngay bëgg a xam?

success.contact: Jërëjëf! Sa laaj yónniku na. Dinanu la jokkoo gannaaw gaa tuuti.
success.appointment: Jottali dëgël na! Dinaa jël dëgël ci iimeel ak SMS ci simili yi ci àttë.

team.title: Sunu ndaje

jobs.title: Jëfandikukat ci dugg
jobs.excerpt: Ànd ak ñi neeweeku ci seen jëf yu njëkk.
jobs.description:
Dañuy wut ab jëfandikukat ngir ànd ak nit yi ñiy dikk.

Wàllu:
- Jàkkaari te nataalal soxla yi
- Oriante ci njoxe yi baax
- Ànd ci jëf administratif yi

Lu wara am:
- Dipoloom ci travail social walla domaine bu jege
- Jubbanti ci intervansion interculturel
- Mën faransee ak anglais

jobs.title: Kilifa faransee
jobs.excerpt: Jàngal faransee ci mag yi ñiy dikk ci tolof-tolof yépp.
jobs.description:
Bokkal ci sunu ndaje francisation.

Wàllu:
- Planifiye te anim jàng faransee
- Sellal jàng ci soxla ñiy jàng
- Nataalal yokk taalibe yi

Lu wara am:
- Baccalauréat ci jàngal FLS
- Jubbanti ci jàngal mag yi
- Metod pedagojik bu dund

jobs.title: Intervenant ci askan
jobs.excerpt: Yokk liggéeyu mbooleem yu di wëral dugg ak dund àdduna.
jobs.description:
Dañuy wut ab intervenant ci askan.

Wàllu:
- Def te anim liggéeyu askan
- Yokk bokkaale lokal
- Ndimbal inisiatif askan

Lu wara am:
- Formasion ci animasion askan
- Jubbanti ci barab multikulturel
- Mën-mën ci jokkoo bu baax

jobs.title: Koordinatër ndaw yi
jobs.excerpt: Koordine programa yi ngir ndaw yi ak mbokk yi ñiy dikk.
jobs.description:
Post kontraa ngir sunu programa ndaw yi.

Wàllu:
- Planifiye liggéeyu ndaw yi
- Dëgëral jokkoo ak ekol yi
- Organise kàmp ak liggéeyu paraeskoler

Lu wara am:
- Dipoloom ci edikasion walla domaine bu jege
- Jubbanti ak ndaw yi ñiy dikk
- Mën faransee-anglais

footer.tagline: Organismu bëgg-bëgg ngir ndimbal immigrant yi

mission.title: Sunu misioŋ
mission.statement: Jàkkaari, ndimbal te ànd ak nit yi ñiy dikk ci seen dugg bu bopp, bu sosjal ak bu profesijonel.
mission.vision: Liggeyal te bokkalante ci biir mën-mën ak jëf yu bees ngir dund àdduna bu gën a baax.
mission.historyIntro:
Ci 1993 lañu sose CARI St-Laurent, mooy ab organismu askan bu bëgg-bëgg bu am misioŋ ngir jàkkaari nit yi ñiy dikk, ndimbal leen ngir tabax, dund te dugg ci réew Québec, ci seen bopp, ci seen mbokk, ci askan wi ak ci liggéey.

Ci lu gën ci ñetti fukki at, CARI St-Laurent moy jox bépp bés njoxeam yu dul fey ci immigrant yi di ñëw ci réew yépp ci àdduna. Ci at bu nekk, sunu ndaje moy ànd ak junniy nit yu dikk ci lu gën ci 128 réew ci seen jëf yu njëkk, seen jàng faransee, seen wut liggéey ak seen dugg ci dund Montréal.

Sunu yoon dafa am solo: dañuy gis bépp nit ci lu mat — yoonam, doolam, mbokkom, xelam. Suuxu sunu njoxe yi, jàppale ak jubbanti sunu ndaje bu bari xam-xam, dañu tax dañuy mën def jëf yu bees yu mu sellal soppi yi ci réew ak dund bu nekk nit.

Ci biir Saint-Laurent, benn ci quartier yi gën a bare diversite ci Montréal, CARI moo nekk aktër bu wara am ci mbir dugg sosjal, lingistik ak profesijonel nit yi ñiy dikk. Sunu programa yi di sàmm jàng faransee, ndimbal ci liggéey, ndimbal mbokk yi, ànd ak jigéen yi, dugg ndaw yi ak lu ci gën.

Su la neeweeku walla su ngay nekk fii ci lu wàññi ci ay at, CARI fii la ngir la ànd ci bépp etaap bu sa yoonu dugg.

slides.title: La diversité nous rapproche
slides.subtitle: Sunu misioŋ
slides.description: Ci lu gën ci 30 at, CARI moy ànd ak nit yi ñiy dikk ci seen dugg bu bopp, bu sosjal ak bu profesijonel ci Québec.
slides.fullContent:
CARI St-Laurent mooy ab organismu askan bu bëgg-bëgg bu am misioŋ ngir jàkkaari nit yi ñiy dikk, ndimbal leen ngir tabax, dund te dugg ci réew Québec.

Ci at bu nekk, sunu ndaje moy ànd ak junniy nit yu dikk ci lu gën ci 128 réew ci seen jëf yu njëkk, seen jàng faransee, seen wut liggéey ak seen dugg ci dund Montréal.

Sunu yoon dafa am solo: dañuy gis bépp nit ci lu mat — yoonam, doolam, mbokkom, xelam.

details.label: Nit ñi ñu ndimbal ci at

slides.title: Bokkaale interculturel
slides.subtitle: Programa bokkaale
slides.description: Defal jokko yu dëgg ak Québécois yi! Sunu programa bokkaale interculturel dafay wëral séddale ak dugg ci kàttanu ndajte yu solo.
slides.fullContent:
Programa bokkaale interculturel bu CARI moo di def pont sosjal ak lingistik diggante ñi neeweeku ak Québécois yi.

Bépp bokkaale mooy wayu am solo ngir seetlu kiltir Québec, pratike faransee ak def xariit yu yàgg. Bénévol Québécois yi dañuy séddal seen xam-xamu dëkk bi, seen tradision ak seen dund bes-bu-bés.

Ndajte yi dañu suux te mu sellal waxtu bu nekk nit: gejj kiltir, andi àddina, liggéeyu sport, seetlu quartier ak lu ci gën.

slides.title: Klinik dimpóo bu dul fey
slides.subtitle: Njoxe bu seesoniye
slides.description: Soxla nga ndimbal ci sa déklarasion alkaati? Sunu klinik dimpóo bu dul fey ubbu na ngir nit yi ñiy dikk yu am xaalis yu wàññi.
slides.fullContent:
Ci at bu nekk, CARI dafay jox njoxe bu dul fey ngir dëgëral déklarasion alkaati ngir nit yi ñiy dikk ak mbokk yi am xaalis yu wàññi.

Sunu bénévol yu formasion am dañuy la ànd ci dëgëral sa déklarasion fédéral ak provënsial. Njoxe bii moo tax nga mën a jël krédi ak prestasion yi la wara am, ni Alokasion kanadiyen ngir doom yi, krédi TPS/TVH ak krédi Solidarite.

Indil say dokumaŋ fiskal yépp (T4, reelve, resu) ak ab kaart identite. Kenn du sa laaj jottali ci waxtu yu ubbu klinik bi.
